meanings.definition: Relating to or containing ascorbic acid.
meanings.sent1: The ascorbic fruits are full of vitamin C.
meanings.sent2: I always choose the ascorbic orange juice for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The ascorbic oranges were so healthy, they started doing jumping jacks!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and refreshing as an ascorbic fruit.
meanings.sent5: The ascorbic properties of the fruit made it a popular choice for boosting immunity.

meanings.definition: Having the properties of ascorbic acid.
meanings.sent1: The ascorbic supplements are good for your health.
meanings.sent2: She bought the ascorbic tablets to improve her immune system.
meanings.sent3: The ascorbic pills were so powerful, they started flexing their muscles!
meanings.sent4: His energy was as vibrant and invigorating as an ascorbic drink.
meanings.sent5: The ascorbic characteristics of the medicine made it effective in fighting off colds.
